intro: Alniaria hunanica, commonly known as the Hunan alder, is a deciduous shrub or small tree native to China. It belongs to the Betulaceae family, which includes birches and alders. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves that are typically ovate to elliptic in shape. It produces small, clustered flowers followed by winged fruits, typical of the family. Alniaria hunanica is often found in moist, well-drained soils along streams and in mountainous regions.
